"Xiera": "Normal attacks form the core of any battle. Let's practice them here!"
"Firstly, please use your <red>third stage<c> normal attack."

"In Elder Form, by selecting \"Dark Blast\" from the main menu and learning the skills Normal Attack Combo Plus 1 and 2, you can add a fourth and fifth stage to your normal attacks.

The fourth and fifth normal attacks take a long time to execute, but their power is very high."
